Extinguish: When you take the Extinguish action, you may end the {@condition On Fire} condition for a creature within 5 feet of you, or within reach of your unarmed strikes (whichever is greater).

items: A creature who is on fire takes {@dice 2d6} damage at the start of each of their turns.
The creature sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.
The effect can be ended early with the {@action Extinguish} action.
